aws::graph::propositions: Amazon Net Sales by Geographic Region (2022-2024)
Amazon had net sales of $356,113 million in the United States in 2022.
Amazon had net sales of $395,637 million in the United States in 2023.
Amazon had net sales of $438,015 million in the United States in 2024.
Amazon had net sales of $33,598 million in Germany in 2022.
Amazon had net sales of $37,588 million in Germany in 2023.
Amazon had net sales of $40,856 million in Germany in 2024.
Amazon had net sales of $30,074 million in the United Kingdom in 2022.
Amazon had net sales of $33,591 million in the United Kingdom in 2023.
Amazon had net sales of $37,855 million in the United Kingdom in 2024.
Amazon had net sales of $24,396 million in Japan in 2022.
Amazon had net sales of $26,002 million in Japan in 2023.
Amazon had net sales of $27,401 million in Japan in 2024.
Amazon had net sales of $69,802 million in the Rest of world in 2022.
Amazon had net sales of $81,967 million in the Rest of world in 2023.
The Rest of world net sales figure for 2024 is incomplete in the source data.
